name: better
title: Better
description: Doing all kind of work like transactions and everything in aptos
author: snehendu_roy

commands.name: better
commands.title: Better
commands.subtitle: A Better interface to interact with aptos
commands.description: You can perform various operations in the aptos blockchain using this

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
